attributes.additional_details: How much will parliament stand by and watch, afraid of getting its hands dirty. If we're not going to send the jets in ourselves, at least send some to Zelensky... Give them a fighting chance.
attributes.background:
Already we are watching and not doing enough for the Ukraine. Zelensky has requested planes to hold off the Putin's invasion. 

How will we all feel if Ukraine goes down. How will we all feel if the bad guys win and the heroes fall. We will regret, we will wish we did more before it was too late.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Pledge any necessary military support to defend Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607314

Seek to impose a no-fly zone over Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
